General Questions.question: What is LeedsApp?
General Questions.answer: LeedsApp is a client follow-up and lead management tool designed to help businesses track leads, schedule reminders, and manage follow-ups efficiently—without the complexity of traditional CRMs.

General Questions.question: Who is LeedsApp for?
General Questions.answer: LeedsApp is built for sales professionals, entrepreneurs, real estate agents, freelancers, small business owners, and teams who want to improve client follow-ups and maximize their lead conversions.

General Questions.question: How is LeedsApp different from other CRMs?
General Questions.answer: Unlike traditional CRMs, LeedsApp is simple, user-friendly, and built specifically for lead follow-ups. It removes unnecessary complexity and focuses on helping businesses stay organized, engage leads, and close more deals faster.

Features & Functionality.question: What features does LeedsApp offer?
answer: Call & Task Reminders – Get notified when it’s time to follow up.
Lead Tracking – Organize, manage, and track every prospect efficiently.
Payment & Task Reminders – Ensure timely payments and task completion.
Team Collaboration – Assign and track leads within your team.
Multi-Channel Follow-Ups – Manage calls, WhatsApp, and emails in one place.
Bulk Lead Import – Upload thousands of leads instantly for streamlined management.

Features & Functionality.question: Can I use LeedsApp for team collaboration?
Features & Functionality.answer: Yes! LeedsApp allows teams to assign leads, track follow-ups, and monitor performance, making it an ideal tool for sales teams and businesses managing multiple clients.

Features & Functionality.question: Does LeedsApp send automatic follow-ups?
Features & Functionality.answer: No, LeedsApp does not automate follow-ups. It helps you schedule timely reminders so you can take action at the right time and never miss an important follow-up.

Pricing & Plans.question: Is LeedsApp free to use?
Pricing & Plans.answer: LeedsApp offers a 7-day free trial so you can explore its features before subscribing to a premium plan.

Pricing & Plans.question: What are the pricing plans?
Pricing & Plans.answer: Our pricing plans vary based on the features you need. Visit our [Pricing Page] for the latest details.

Pricing & Plans.question: Do you offer discounts for teams?
Pricing & Plans.answer: Yes! We provide special pricing for teams and bulk users. Contact our sales team for more details.

Using LeedsApp.question: How do I add a lead to LeedsApp?
Using LeedsApp.answer: Go to Leads > Add New Lead, enter the details, and save. You can also import leads in bulk from a CSV file.

Using LeedsApp.question: How do I set up follow-up reminders?
Using LeedsApp.answer: When adding a lead, click “Set Reminder”, choose the date & time, and LeedsApp will notify you when it’s time to follow up.

Using LeedsApp.question: Can I integrate LeedsApp with other tools?
Using LeedsApp.answer: LeedsApp is working on integrations with WhatsApp, email, and other CRM platforms. Stay tuned for updates!

Troubleshooting & Account Management.question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
Troubleshooting & Account Management.answer: Go to the LeedsApp login page, click “Forgot Password”, and follow the instructions to reset it.

Troubleshooting & Account Management.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
Troubleshooting & Account Management.answer: LeedsApp subscriptions are non-refundable and billed annually. You can cancel your subscription at any time, but the plan will remain active until the end of the billing period.

Troubleshooting & Account Management.question: My reminders are not working. What should I do?
answer: Make sure: Notifications are enabled for LeedsApp.
Your phone is connected to the internet.
The reminder time & date are correctly set.
If issues persist, contact support@leedsapp.com for assistance.
